title: Westside suite with cozy backyard (close to UCSC and downtown)
posting_body: Renting a fully remodeled suite located in an excellent neighborhood in Santa Cruz.
Great for professional individuals or couples.
What we provide:
- spacious living room and bathroom
- Newly installed floors, cabinets, and painted walls
- appliances (electric cooktop, refrigerator, microwave)
- A/C and heater
- Cozy and tiny backyard suitable for outdoor dining
- Very close to university (1.2 miles, 10 min bike, 25 minutes walk, 6 min bus)
- One dedicated driveway parking (street parking is also available)
- very close to UCSC
- convenient access to 1 and 17 highways.
- walking distance to downtown, shops and restaurants.
Looking for :
- responsible, respectful, and clean
tenants (2 occupants at most)
- no smoking, drugs, or party please
- minimum 1 year lease
- Stable income and good credit score
We provide utilities (electricity, water, wireless internet, trash) for $150 per person.
Deposit is $3000.
A little bit about us: I am a software engineer and my wife is an architect.
We are peaceful and educated people and we want to have a good relationship with our tenants.
Please introduce yourself shortly if interested.
